name: Befrenemy
description:
Developed for the NUCATS game jam.

Befrenemy is a game where you befriend your enemies so that you can help each other escape a forest.

Controls:

Contorl the character with W,A,S,D.

When you unlock the slime switch to him with the left key and back to the other character with the down key.

Move portals with the mouse buttons (You can only move them on the dotted backgrounds)

I created the pixel art assets in aesprite.
